units.Description: Measurement unit of the data values

low_cutoff.Description: Low cutoff frequency of the filter in Hz

high_cutoff.Description: High cutoff frequency of the filter in Hz

side.Description: Side of the brain. L for left, R for right

soz.Description: Seizure onset zone. 1 for yes, 0 for no

status.Description: Bad channel status. 1 for bad, 0 for good

resection.Description: Resection status. 1 for resected, 0 for not

bad.Description: Bad channel status. 1 for bad, 0 for good
